---
category: news
title: "Robots can now deliver food on Wichita State University Campus"
excerpt: "Students at Wichita State University can now get food delivered by robot to their dorm room or other campus location. On Tuesday, the university started an on-demand service that delivers food from several campus restaurants without human contact. The service works with both the in-house student dining plan or with a credit card."
